ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City/Twisted Spark
ygData.msgSnippet: Mutate was even more confused than before he meet Rhesus, still he was happy to be alive. He somewhat wanted to help Megatron, but still couldn t remember why

Mutate was even more confused than before he meet
Rhesus, still he was happy to be alive. He somewhat
wanted to help Megatron, but still couldn't remember
why he felt disdain towards him. And Rampage seemed to
enjoy Megatron being down and mearly out. He didn't
want to make one of only 3 true friends he had ever
had mad at him.  Also he knew that given the same
chance Megatron would undoubtedly finish him.  This
gave him an idea. Rhesus had given him a STUN pistol
because he didn't like to fight. Megatron couldn't
possibly dodge it now. It might send him under, but
he'd still be alive, and Rampage wouldn't hurt him. So
he took aim, mouthed the words "I'm sorry" and pulled
the trigger.

--- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
> As Rampage rolled up to near the Transmutate, he
> stopped, his crab head
> first looked up, "Rampage, TERRORIZE." Through a
> backflip, Rampage
> shifted into his robot mode, holding his large
> Gattling cannon awquardly
> to a side. He looked to Mutate, and put a finger to
> his mouth,
> "Shhhhhhhh." He whispere. "Let me indulge in the
> pain surrounding this
> area." He turned, and held his hands up, as if
> grasping something, yet
> nothing was there. "Yes, it's so cold, so much
> suffering. H AH ha ha
> ha." He began to cackle insanly, holding his cannon
> up, and firring
> missiles off randomly, his barrel shifting for a new
> missile to replace
> the old one, as barrages headed everywhere.
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------
> Megatron tried to push himself upright, but could
> not, it can't end
> here, he thought to himself. "Decepticons." He said
> through a strained
> voice, "Fin....finish the retreat."
>
